column2: Other long-term liabilities represent cash obligations recorded on our consolidated balance sheets including the short-term portion of these long-term liabilities and consist primarily of payments owed in connection with certain commercial agreements investments and asset retirement obligations. In addition to the amounts above we had long-term tax payable of 4.7 billion as of December 31 2016 primarily related to uncertain tax positions.
